meanings.definition: The measurement of the longest dimension of an object.
meanings.sent1: I used a ruler to find the lengs of the table.
meanings.sent2: The lengs of the rope were carefully recorded for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The lengs of the room seemed to change every time I measured it!
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as long as the lengs of a marathon track.
meanings.sent5: The lengs of the bridge were so impressive that it became a tourist attraction.

meanings.definition: To extend or stretch out to a greater length.
meanings.sent1: He tried to lengs his arms to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: The cat likes to lengs its body when waking up from a nap.
meanings.sent3: I will lengs my bedtime story to delay going to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The vines seemed to lengs towards the sunlight in the morning.
meanings.sent5: She decided to lengs her vacation to enjoy more time at the beach.

meanings.definition: A long, narrow strip of land.
meanings.sent1: The lengs of the beach provided a beautiful view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The hikers followed the lengs of the trail through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The lengs of the park were perfect for a leisurely stroll.
meanings.sent4: The lengs of the farm stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The lengs of the riverbank were covered in colorful flowers.
